titles.title: Field Report for Young Basaltic Samples from the Basin and Range

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: This field report includes maps and photos that document the location of samples collected for NSF-Earthscope-0745797, to study mantle dynamics and magmatism across the Basin and Range. Samples are from young mafic centers in the Black Rock (UT), Snow Canyon (UT) and Uinkaret (Western Grand Canyon, AZ) Volcanic Fields. Special targets include scoria lapilli from cinder cones, to provide well-quenched material for olivine-hosted melt inclusion volatile studies. Samples include IGSN.
Basin and Range, volatiles, melt inclusions, scoria, mantle melting

geoLocation.geoLocationPlace: Basin and Range, Black Rock Volcanic Field, Snow Canyon Volcanic Field, Uinkaret Volcanic Field, Western Grand Canyon, Utah, Arizona
